title: PROJECT: Riven
body:
Found this on Reddit, though it's been posted for a bit on the European forums.

http://i.imgur.com/n2xuXLB.jpg

http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2jm9co/projectriven_skin_final_splash_art/

DOITRIOT!!! DOITNOW!!!!!

replies.body:
Lol Riven and the motorcycle reference.

EDIT: Here are the references

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/7a750805e9c5b308bb15accaf7201c9e.jpg

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=875464&d=1389470028

i had to look it up, and then i lol'd 
http://imgur.com/a/WHogD in case anyone else is confused, the first/last pics explain it
So, basically, you're taking pictures of Riven and adding sunglasses and a motorcycle.  That's kind of cool, actually.

> So, basically, you're taking pictures of Riven and adding sunglasses and a motorcycle.  That's kind of cool, actually.

Not my work. 

Although comparing it to the original splash art, it is an improvement lol.
I'm throwing money at my screen but nothing happens. Riot pls

LOVE IT I'D PIMP OUT MY SISTER FOR THE MONEY TO BUY THE RP TO AFFORD THIS!
RIOT PLEASE!
:3 hit me up if you do
yasuo is in the background

> yasuo is in the background

Good eyes. 

I would love to see this skin too!

Holy shit.
I already have a skin for Riven but I'd toss my money blindly at Riot for this one...
then there needs to be a project yi
Reminds me Transistor.
anyone?
Jesus I was JUST talking about this. Honestly, my favorite skin idea ever. But we'll never see it. =( I'd even settle for that one that resembles War from Darksiders.
Transriven
Imagine if she gets a special entry like Braum, only she enters via motorcycle.

replies.poster: 0 C T O P U S S
replies.body: ty Yousosmart for share.
Would ~~bone~~ buy.

I've been in support of this skin for a while now. Riven and Yasuo totally have that Raiden / Jetstream Sam flair that needs to be done. I just hope when Riot does the skin they don't mess with Riven's hairstyle and keep it the same (like they did in Project: Yasuo). One of the main reason I don't like Dragonblade Riven is because the hair just looks off.
DOITNOW!
Oh fuck yes. I love this, almost as much as the Transistor/Red Riven skin. Which is sadly never going to happen. But still, this is solid.
Did you ever think about a Project Sion though? That'd be bad"butt". Or Mecha Sion. Ahh... *Nerdgasm*
She looks like a combination of Dr. Mercy from Overwatch and Ryden from Metal Gear Revengance.

The only thing I don't like is the orange, change it to green -her signature color- and we'll have a deal.

On a side note: SEE PEOPLE? How hard is it to put an image on more than one site?!
Yes.
I want her.
IMO the yellow should be replaced with red to fit the theme
the theme is orange anyway
bump yes
holy shit
and her backing animation has the motorcycle materializing out of nowhere, she puts her sword on her back, gets on the bike, and rides off
Project: Jayce
That's called Full Metal Jayce. The PROJECT: Yasuo skin goes along with that... that's why PROJECT, isn't a line in itself.
Rito pls
I WANT THIS
OMG! I would totally buy this skin! Its so cool and creative. It looks way better than Project: Yasuo.
DOITRITO not DOITRIOT
plz
I WANT RIVEN{{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:92}} {{item:3031}}
Reminds me of Ghost in the Shell.

So many good Riven concepts...

And yea, this is awesome, a beam sword would help explain her ult as well.
10/10 would buy. If I didn't have Dragonblade already... Pretty awesome skin concept though
LOOK THE ONLY RIVEN SKIN WORTH BUYING :D
Please let this be legit!
Not a fan of futuristic/robotic costumes.. but this is probably the best I've seen for Riven.
IT LOOKS EPIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIC :D

really??
i love riven{{champion:92}} <3

outrageous
